text: Tain-l'Hermitage is a commune. It is in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes in the Drôme department in southeast France. == Geography == Tain-l'Hermitage is on the left bank of the river Rhône, opposite Tournon-sur-Rhône, which is in Ardèche. == Economy == It produces wines, including Cornas AOC and Hermitage AOC. == Twin towns == Tain-l'Hermitage is twinned with: * Fellbach, Germany * Erba, Italy == References == Category:Communes in Drôme
